title: Matthew Hancock – 2014 Speech to Federation of Small Businesses Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Matthew Hancock, the Minister of State for Skills and Enterprise, to the Federation of Small Businesses Conference held in Manchester on 28th March 2014.
